title: "AI tool can predict which ingredient in foods, cosmetics causes cancer"
excerpt: "For identifying any substance as cancer-causing, it has to undergo animal testing, then given to human beings and studied for at least five to ten years to see whether it has resulted in cancer. What Metabokiller does is quickly identify the possibly cancer-causing molecules."
